title: Cine | Avengers: Endgame
body:
Cine | Avengers: Endgame

El grave desenlace de los acontecimientos provocados por Thanos, que acabó con la mitad del universo y parte de Los Vengadores, obliga a aquellos Súper Héroes que sobrevivieron a tomar una firme posición en AVENGERS: ENDGAME. La nueva película de Marvel Studios marca el gran cierre de un recorrido cinematográfico sin precedentes.

AVENGERS: ENDGAME es producida por Kevin Feige y dirigida por…

summary: Familiar Villains From Infinity War Will Appear in Avengers: Endgame
title: Familiar Villains From Infinity War Will Appear in Avengers: Endgame
body:
Familiar Villains From Infinity War Will Appear in #AvengersEndgame

Earlier today people on Reddit and Twitter noticed something in 3D versions of the Avengers: Endgame trailer that were posted on YouTube. In the shot of Hawkeye running down the exploding corridor, bodies could be seen in the fire when the cannot be seen in the 2D version of the same trailer.

I managed to track down the source footage the YouTubers used to create the 3D trailer, and confirmed…

View On WordPress

summary: Avengers: Endgame Featurette Released Talks About Finding "That Shred Of Hope"
title: Avengers: Endgame Featurette Released Talks About Finding "That Shred Of Hope"
body:
Avengers: Endgame Featurette Released Talks About Finding “That Shred Of Hope”

Credit: Marvel Studios

Avengers: Endgame is barreling toward us. Within a month, fans will see the culmination of 22 films over 11 years.

It’s definitely an insane time in the Marvel fandom. Though the insanity has been going on ever since we all had a collective meltdown over Avengers: Infinity War in April 2018. So this stuff? It’s nothing new.

With the release of the brand new character posters

summary: There’s a faint chance that Agents of SHIELD hid an Endgame easter egg in season 4. I’ll write it out under the cut to avoid...
body:
There’s a faint chance that Agents of SHIELD hid an Endgame easter egg in season 4. I’ll write it out under the cut to avoid possible spoilers.

Agents of SHIELD season 4, episode 5 more or less starts with a flashback. A pair of scientists is tracking a mystical book and they track it to the basement of someone’s family home. 

On the wall is a poster for “The Quentin Carnival”. The poster was prominent enough that I had to Google it. 

The Quentin Carnival - at least in the Earth-616 universe of comics (read: the main universe of comics) - is connected to a whole host of people. One of them is Johnny Blaze (he was Ghost Rider for a time and ends up King of Hell… it’s a whole thing). Johnny ends up trapped in the Soul Stone but is ultimately freed and returns to his normal life. 

So…there you go. It’s nothing concrete but it’s a damn fine hypothesis.
body_abstract: There’s a faint chance that Agents of SHIELD hid an Endgame easter egg in season 4. I’ll write it out under the cut to avoid possible spoilers.

title: Avenge de fallen
body:
La espera lentamente se acorta, la llegada y cierre a Avengers se acerca lentamente al 26 de abril y Marvel Studios ha sacado a la luz varios posters conceptuales de uno de los eventos cinematográficos de la historia.

summary: anyone have any theories on why the Engame poster’s characters are facing a certain way??? I was thinking of ‘if you’re looking...
body:
anyone have any theories on why the Engame poster’s characters are facing a certain way??? I was thinking of ‘if you’re looking at the camera, you dead and gone’ or ‘you coming back’ but I’m thinking there is symbolism in the way ALL of them are facing??? 

I need theories; go.

summary: I think we can all agree
body:
I think we can all agree

If Marvel decides not to bring any of the dead heroes back, it’s because they have a death wish.

The fandom will have no mercy.
